column5: First,  Sorry Aron and Fidel my cell is M.I.A.  Second,  Yes I'm grandstanding but only because Gerritt promised me he would shave his head if I caught some pike and I never know when I can get out!  Anyways, only 1 week to be sick of my perpetually pompous, pikey 'ports.  Today was odd, Rain, warm, Rain, cold  Anyways, The pike are on..... DON'T DELAY GO TODAY!   The scoop:  Had some great follows, Lost 2 Landed 2 (1 snotty)  Water shot (there's the bargain bin lure that yesterdays pike swallowed)   Head shot (brief vertical hold right after hook was removed. Her head was quite thick)   She was plump. 2 tons of fun. Spawn is on! Yeah baby, Yeah!!   Thanks, FishheadRic Lucid Highdrifter
NICE WORK!  common Sunday!
Another great fish. What are we doing at work we should be out there trying for some big pike like yours. Keep'em coming snog your making me drule. Maybe i'll see ya on the weekend. happy fishing
Great report Grant.  Looks like they're on for sure.  Way to go  Your thread title reminds me of a t-shirt I saw.  It said:  Its all about me, me, me, get over it!    Joey

WOW!!! You did it again!  Great job out there...I think I'll have to get down to the lake tonite or tomorrow and see if I can pull anything out of there.  It'll kill me though...if I pull a nice walleye out by accident....cause I cant post on OOS fish...LOL.  You think if I photohop it just right I can make a walleye look like a pike???
If all goes well I am heading down tomorrow. Save some for the rest of!
If they can make Michael Jackson look like an emaciated white woman, anythings possible!
Thought you were in a Hamtown jail?
We here at OFC like it when you show off with fishy pics! Well I do at least!
I am . Going fishing is my punishment.  You heading down again tomorrow?
Thanks PT!
Tomorrow is sketchy. I have a job.
sweet, ill be out there tommorow also
That does it.  I'm quitting my job to get some piking in before the season closes!
holy crap i hate you.. i need to get out NOW!!!
good job, keep showin off, living vicariously thru others posts is the closest i've been to fishing in a few weeks
Well done.... again Snag.  Maybe i'll head out there at weekend and cast a lure or two.  Thanks for sharing 007
Some nice fish you're getting there, great to see good soft water reports....  Maureen

Snag...checked out our shore spots late afternoon yesterday...and all were muddy with almost no visibility.  The water in one of your shots had that great green tinge to it.  Oh well, hopefully we can hook into one before the season closes!!
nice fish...better melon in that av...
